It all started with a rescue named Watson. When Watson had an eye problem, his parent’s realized they didn’t have a product they could trust. Luckily, Watson’s dad works at Bausch + Lomb. Together, they saw an opportunity to help not just Watson, but dogs everywhere.

Ames Watson Brands (AWB) invests in both emerging and established brands. We are a "brand accelerator" that surrounds our partners with industry experts in operations, merchandising, marketing and back-office support.
